name: The Horde (itch) (derpygamer2142)
description:
THIS PROJECT IS BROKEN. I managed to fix the issue, but due to the restrictions of my current device, I can't download the file to upload it to itch.io. If you want to play the game, go to https://turbowarp.org/778195051.

Use mouse to move, space to use rock, 1, 2, 3, and 4 to switch item, press e to open the crafting table placing, press f to place, m to toggle map, g to open crafting menu when near a crafting table, q to place wood blocks.

When the game starts, it's the daytime. You have 2 minutes to gather materials, craft items, and build good defenses. Each tools does extra damage against a certain type of resource, which is pretty obvious.
